blog.name: sylispokeworldheadcanons
blog.title: But what if we all did live in a Pokemon world
blog.description: Hi I'm Syli and I think about Pokemon too much. Headcanons about how the Pokemon world might work. May not be 100% canon compatible. I also lift elements from different continuities/adaptations based on what I like. Asks and so forth are welcome, but I might be slow about answering. If you need anything tagged just let me know.

summary: Did any celebrities (Golden age Hollywood) own pokemon
question: Did any celebrities (Golden age Hollywood) own pokemon
answer:
Of course! Pokémon have been involved in this world’s film industry since its beginning. Since this is an alternate universe, the actors and celebrities of the golden age of movies are different than those of our world (and I don’t know that much about particular people of the era), but I can tell you about some of the Pokémon associated with these movies.

Directors now shooting in color would show off large numbers of colorful Pokémon. One film used every color of Minior for its most famous sequence. With the advent of sound movies, musicals would often have a number highlighting a Pokémon’s singing skills. Chatot, whose mimicry also lets it play comedic roles, and Primarina, who loves the spotlight and is good at taking direction, were popular choices. Swarms of Zubat and a Chandelure floating above set the tone in many an early horror movie. And any good femme fatale from film noir would be accompanied by a Liepard.

blog.name: nobodiesheartlessshitblog45
blog.title: Positive Mental Attitude Pikachu For The Win
blog.description:
My blog is about things I enjoy. Huge fan of the Walking dead, Pokémon, and anime. I’m obsessed with music from video game soundtracks, death metal, Indie Pop and classic rock. Also I’m fan of Markiplier, Jacksepticeye, Game Grumps and Pewdiepie. Animals are the best, mostly dogs. I just do my own thing and that’s pretty much it. Kinda Hipster and Punk, and have stupid your sense of humor. I also do have an art blog where I post some of my personal artwork, sketches and illustrations. So yeah there’s that. Here my art blog where I post my personal art

https://nobodiesheartless45artblog.tumblr.com/

summary: So I’ve been playing Pokémon Let’s Go Pikachu for about a month.
body:
So I’ve been playing Pokémon Let’s Go Pikachu for about a month.

And I never really got into the Pokémon Go Game because it something that I’m not interested in playing.

But so far, absolutely adore let’s go Pikachu. It’s different, it is really, really, fun. And honestly, it’s really making me look forward to the new Pokémon sword and shield game.

I hope they remake Pokémon Silver or Gold, actually I want in the remake Pokémon black and white. Because oh my God, me I think that’s one of my favorites, because I fell out of Pokémon for a while in that game made me fall in love with The whole series again.

I just love Pokémon. I love Harry Potter and I love Star Wars.

But I love Pokémon way more, because it’s what got me into video games I’ve ever play and I still love it.

I just cannot get over this series. I just love it so much. It’s so great.

By the way I nickname a Pikachu Riply, he’s the best boy ever.

blog.name: pokemon-plush-rescue
blog.title: Pokemon Plushie Rescue
blog.description: Over the years I've rescued a lot of Pokemon plushies from thrift stores and yard sales, and I put this blog together to catalog my different Pokemon rescues, as well as the other Pokemon plushies that have come into my life that never cease to make me smile. With the success of Dr. Sword's recovery post on my main blog, I'd figure this would also be an interesting place to have

summary: This is Tater Tot the Rowlet! I actually made him before I made Big Potato, just to get a basic idea of what the pattern would...
caption: This is Tater Tot the Rowlet! I actually made him before I made Big Potato, just to get a basic idea of what the pattern would look like. He’s very smol, and I did kind of put his wings on crooked, but that just gives him character! While he isn’t a rescue, he’s still a great member of the Pokefamily, and I love him.

reblog.comment: This is Tater Tot the Rowlet! I actually made him before I made Big Potato, just to get a basic idea of what the pattern would look like. He’s very smol, and I did kind of put his wings on crooked, but that just gives him character! While he isn’t a rescue, he’s still a great member of the Pokefamily, and I love him.

summary: Working on a new nuzlocke comic. Holly here is my trainer for this run. She’s Prof Rowans niece, her moms ex husband is his...
caption:
Working on a new nuzlocke comic. Holly here is my trainer for this run. She’s Prof Rowans niece, her moms ex husband is his brother. Which is a stupidly complicated way to say it. They’re still close and Holly is even studying to be a professor. 

At the start of our journey holly is back for the summer from Alola, where she’s been studying and is suddenly asked to do more and more favours by her uncle until shes done the whole league. (maybe)

Shes stubborn and likes to do the things the hard way, but her pragmatic nature helps out in the wilds. Which is where she mostly is.

blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Lugioh Lugia and Ho-oh fusion Flying Type Ability: Pressure Hidden Ability: Rainbow Winds - Flying type moves have a 10% chance...
caption:
Lugioh

Lugia and Ho-oh fusion

Flying Type

Ability: Pressure

Hidden Ability: Rainbow Winds - Flying type moves have a 10% chance to inflict any status on the opponent.

Stats: HP - 126, Atk - 120, Def - 120, SpA - 120, SpD - 165, Spe - 112

The Weather Pokemon

When Lugia and Ho-oh are threatened, they combine together to create Lugioh.  Lugioh is a force not to be reckoned with.  It wings can change the weather with a single flap.  

Request for anon.  I hope you like it!

summary: i live for small punchy babie boys
caption: i live for small punchy babie boys

summary:
My very top favorite #Pokemon in #PokemonGo Have changed a number of times since I first started playing. 
I would say that...
body:
My very top favorite #Pokemon in #PokemonGo Have changed a number of times since I first started playing.

I would say that Pikachu, Eevee, and just about EVERYTHING DRAGON and/or Legendary goes without saying! Those are everyone’s favorite! I liked Pikachu even before I ever liked Pokémon. And I was often on the fence over whether or not I even liked Pokémon back in the day. But Pikachu is just so perfectly cute! I also love everything Dragon and mythical already.

I originally never wanted to play Pokémon Go because it seemed to be causing trouble IRL. But, my daughter wouldn’t give up n lobbied me as nausium to play w her n the local little children in the neighborhood who needed an adult to go outside with them. （human abduction trafficking is a serious problem) So, to humor the kids I downloaded the app n reluctantly began playing…. not long after the 1st hour, I couldn’t stop playing, n played every day for weeks!

I noticed there were a number of unicorns that were Pokémon n I love unicorns 🦄!

So, at first I was very fond of Weedle. I took a number of photos w Weedle.

Then, I started going to classes at UMASS Boston. So, I kept playing, and I really liked #Gengar:

I would’ve continued to play but the size of the app got so large that by early 2018, I had to delete it off of my old original iPhone.

But after a videography gig I did in May last year, my coworker told me the game was updated n better than ever. I’d made the conscious decision in June to completely leave Facebook n deactivated my account there.

So, I needed something to fill the void.

I was overwhelmed when I went back to play and forgot everything. I forgot what to do, and how to play. I also felt pretty lost in my life n spent much of my time working on video & animation.

But, by the end of August I started playing here and there. By September my kid n spouse went back to school, but I didn’t. So I had ample time to play.

But my iPhone kept getting hacked. It destroyed my old iPhone so by October Apple got me a new replacement. (Id been having a terrorism hacker problem for several years)

But, once I got that new iPhone I went fully hardcore. I pushed myself to do raids, Level up, and try to take on the gym myself. Eventually I started doing it. I never really did raids before that.

I noticed that when I played Pokémon Go I actually felt happy. I already enjoyed going outside whenever the weather was good.

I started to notice that a certain Pokémon used to make me feel especially happy inside which was #squirtle! I would feel very giddy and excited! So I would often try to find them! It soon became my favorite!

Then #Mudkip was out, and I was just as enamored w that one! I only have 2!

Then, #Lickitung! Lickitung is like a weird funny cute cute that’s adorable!

Those were my top favorites this year….

Until I started finding #Bulbasaur everywhere!

Currently Bulbasaur n all the Evolutions of it are my favorites!

I just love the cute moody Bulbasaur! It’s so adorable!

#MyPokemonGoLife #PokemonGo

I was overwhelmed when I went back to play and forgot everything. I forgot what to do, and how to play. I also felt pretty lost in my life n spent much of my time working on video & animation.

But, by the end of August I started playing here and there. By September my kid n spouse went back to school, but I didn’t. So I had ample time to play.

But my iPhone kept getting hacked. It destroyed my old iPhone so by October Apple got me a new replacement. (Id been having a terrorism hacker problem for several years)

But, once I got that new iPhone I went fully hardcore. I pushed myself to do raids, Level up, and try to take on the gym myself. Eventually I started doing it. I never really did raids before that.

I noticed that when I played Pokémon Go I actually felt happy. I already enjoyed going outside whenever the weather was good.

I started to notice that a certain Pokémon used to make me feel especially happy inside which was #squirtle! I would feel very giddy and excited! So I would often try to find them! It soon became my favorite!

Then #Mudkip was out, and I was just as enamored w that one! I only have 2!

Then, #Lickitung! Lickitung is like a weird funny cute cute that’s adorable!

Those were my top favorites this year….

Until I started finding #Bulbasaur everywhere!

Currently Bulbasaur n all the Evolutions of it are my favorites!

I just love the cute moody Bulbasaur! It’s so adorable!

#MyPokemonGoLife #PokemonGo
trail.content:
My very top favorite #Pokemon in #PokemonGo Have changed a number of times since I first started playing.

I would say that Pikachu, Eevee, and just about EVERYTHING DRAGON and/or Legendary goes without saying! Those are everyone’s favorite! I liked Pikachu even before I ever liked Pokémon. And I was often on the fence over whether or not I even liked Pokémon back in the day. But Pikachu is just so perfectly cute! I also love everything Dragon and mythical already.

I originally never wanted to play Pokémon Go because it seemed to be causing trouble IRL. But, my daughter wouldn’t give up n lobbied me as nausium to play w her n the local little children in the neighborhood who needed an adult to go outside with them. （human abduction trafficking is a serious problem) So, to humor the kids I downloaded the app n reluctantly began playing…. not long after the 1st hour, I couldn’t stop playing, n played every day for weeks!

I noticed there were a number of unicorns that were Pokémon n I love unicorns 🦄!

So, at first I was very fond of Weedle. I took a number of photos w Weedle.

Then, I started going to classes at UMASS Boston. So, I kept playing, and I really liked #Gengar:

I would’ve continued to play but the size of the app got so large that by early 2018, I had to delete it off of my old original iPhone.

But after a videography gig I did in May last year, my coworker told me the game was updated n better than ever. I’d made the conscious decision in June to completely leave Facebook n deactivated my account there.

So, I needed something to fill the void.

I was overwhelmed when I went back to play and forgot everything. I forgot what to do, and how to play. I also felt pretty lost in my life n spent much of my time working on video & animation.

But, by the end of August I started playing here and there. By September my kid n spouse went back to school, but I didn’t. So I had ample time to play.

But my iPhone kept getting hacked. It destroyed my old iPhone so by October Apple got me a new replacement. (Id been having a terrorism hacker problem for several years)

But, once I got that new iPhone I went fully hardcore. I pushed myself to do raids, Level up, and try to take on the gym myself. Eventually I started doing it. I never really did raids before that.

I noticed that when I played Pokémon Go I actually felt happy. I already enjoyed going outside whenever the weather was good.

I started to notice that a certain Pokémon used to make me feel especially happy inside which was #squirtle! I would feel very giddy and excited! So I would often try to find them! It soon became my favorite!

Then #Mudkip was out, and I was just as enamored w that one! I only have 2!

Then, #Lickitung! Lickitung is like a weird funny cute cute that’s adorable!

Those were my top favorites this year….

Until I started finding #Bulbasaur everywhere!

Currently Bulbasaur n all the Evolutions of it are my favorites!

I just love the cute moody Bulbasaur! It’s so adorable!

#MyPokemonGoLife #PokemonGo

blog.name: artpharos
blog.title: Artpharos
blog.description: Where a slightly crazy artist person throws stuff under the guise of anonymity. Posts Tales of and Pokemon mainly. Prone to ranting about competitive pokemon. Art blog is artyartpile.

summary: Antumbra Chapter 2: Helping Hand
title: Antumbra Chapter 2: Helping Hand
body:
Finally updated Chapter 2 after what felt like 3 weeks. Has it been 3 weeks I haven’t been keeping track but life’s been busy so WELP. ANYWAY more Sun being the only bright light in the world, and Moon fidgeting and coming to terms with the new normal before the action starts. At least now I think I’ve laid down all the setup I need so we’ll see how the next update goes 8′D 

In her world, the side room of her house had always been set aside for a non-existent ‘guest’. A bed, a wardrobe, a mirror… all exactly as her mother had left it, even in her world. Moon had never thought she would use it. The pillows weren’t quite her own, but the scent of wood and sea breeze calmed her. To her relief, the oblivion of sleep came almost immediately, after the exhaustion of a long and confusing day.

She woke up to the sound of her mother’s humming, the pans clanking on the stove. When she blinked open her eyes, she was greeted by the sight of Rowlet, crooning softly in her sleep as she perched by the windowsill. It made her smile.

But as reality set in, the despondent weight that had disappeared in her sleep settled against her once more. She wouldn’t be waking up to go to school. She wouldn’t be strolling down the Hau'oli streets with Lillie and her friends. And as the easy comfort of her dreams faded, so did her smile.

Moon buried her face against the pillows once more. She didn’t want to wake up. Didn’t know how to face the day.

She didn’t know how long she laid there, unwilling to break the illusion. Then the door creaked open, followed by the sound of bare feet on wood. Her mother’s honeyed voice, asking, “Moon, dear, are you awake?”

There was no use hiding now. Shuffling the pillows aside, she sat upright and turned to the woman who was her mother- and not.

There were some visible differences. Sun’s mom stood far more relaxed, her smile far more easy and bright. The crow’s feet at the corner of her eyes were less evident, even if there was more gray in her hair. She was different from her own mother, yet she had embraced Moon tight when she cried the day before. Listened to her story without a word, and then offered her food, a bath, and even a room. Now, she beamed her comforting smile. “I made breakfast. Hungry?”

[Read on AO3] | [Read From Prologue]
